metadata.title: Hartz Disposable Cat Diapers, Easy to Put On, Comfortable & Secure Fit for 12 Hours Leak Protection, Multiple Sizes,X-Small (SS)
features: EASY TO PUT ON & STAY ON: With easy-to-grip, wide, adjustable tabs, these disposable cat diapers are easy to put on and fit securely. Contains 10 XS cat diapers
MAXIMUM COMFORT: The soft and breathable material allows the diaper to fit comfortably on your cat without falling off or slipping down, even on the most active cats.
12 HOUR LEAK PROOF PROTECTION: The highly absorbent core with Flash Dry Technology instantly turns liquid into GEL for up to 12 hours of leak proof protection.
ADJUSTABLE TAILHOLE: Designed thoughtfully for the many shapes and sizes of cats’ tails, the tailhole can be adjusted both wider and taller for your kitty’s size.
USAGE OCCASIONS: Ideal for Markings or Spraying, Incontinence, Females in Heat, Recovery from Surgery, or Travel.
description: Hartz disposable cat diapers provide a solution for cat parents to assist with their kitty’s potty needs. Designed specifically to fit a cat’s unique body shape comfortably, these diapers are easy to put on, with wide adjustable tabs, soft & stretchable gathers, and an adjustable tailhole. These features provide a secure fit without any slipping and bunching and can accommodate tails of all sizes. The ultra-absorbent core is created with our unique FlashDry Technology, which instantly turns liquid into GEL, for up to 12 hours of leak proof protection. The comfortable and breathable material is gentle on your cat’s skin while wicking away moisture to keep your cat dry and happy! With 2 fun designs, Hartz disposable cat diapers can be worn by both male and female cats. Diapers can be helpful to prevent marking or spraying, for cats who suffer from incontinence, females in heat, recovery from surgery or for use during travel. Available in 3 sizes for any size kitty: Extra Small, Small, and Medium.
